roleset.name: emit light intermittently
roleset.note: GLINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'glint' based on sentences in brown. (from glint.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: bright lights, big city
example.text: There were lights glinting in the city, too, even though it was now dark enough for a few stars to become visible.
example.arg: even though it was now dark enough for a few stars to become visible

roleset.name: look at with shining eyes
roleset.note: GLINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'glint' based on sentences in brown. (from glint.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: weird sentence
example.text: She glinted suspiciously at the dish before her: ``blowfish.''
